name: ConfigMate Plugin
description: Configuration and template management tool for network engineers. Creates, generates, and compares device configurations with template support and intuitive GUI integration.
author: NetWORKS Team

dependencies.description: Required for device configuration retrieval and command execution

toolbar_actions.name: Quick Generate
toolbar_actions.description: Quick configuration generation for selected devices

changes: Completed comprehensive plugin requirements implementation
Added all required plugin interface methods: get_info(), get_description(), get_capabilities(), get_settings_pages(), get_documentation_url(), get_support_info()
Enhanced settings system with 18 configurable options across 6 categories (Core, UI, Safety, Export, Advanced, Debug)
Implemented comprehensive settings pages with proper UI widgets and validation
Added extensive documentation: README.md, USAGE_GUIDE.md, LICENSE file
Enhanced manifest.json with complete capabilities, UI integration, and metadata
Improved plugin information and support infrastructure
Added troubleshooting guides and best practices documentation
Implemented proper plugin versioning and changelog management
All plugin interface requirements now fully satisfied
Initial release of ConfigMate plugin
Template creation and management with syntax highlighting
Intelligent template generation from device configurations
Configuration generation and preview functionality
Side-by-side configuration comparison with diff highlighting
Integration with command_manager plugin for device operations
GUI integration with toolbar, context menus, and right panel widget
Variable detection and substitution system
Batch operations support for multiple devices
Export capabilities for templates and comparison results
Comprehensive settings management with categorized options
Multiple template formats (text, Jinja2, simple, Python)
Multiple export formats (text, HTML, PDF, JSON, YAML)
Platform support for Cisco IOS/NX-OS, Juniper, and generic devices
Safety features including validation and backup creation
Performance optimizations with caching and parallel processing
Debug mode and comprehensive logging for troubleshooting
Complete plugin interface implementation with all required methods
Extensive documentation including README, API reference, and troubleshooting guide
